p: Baseline genotyping is routinely performed in all HIV-infected participants without informed written consent. Ethics approval for encrypted and non-nominative phylogenetic surveillance of the HIV epidemic was obtained from the Ministère de la Santé and L’Institut national de santé publique du Québec in 2008. Continuing annual ethics approval (CODIM-MBM-15-185, renewed January 26, 2018) was obtained from the Centre Intégré universitaire de santé et de service sociaux du Centre-Ouest-de-l’Île-de-Montréal—Hôpital général juif, in accordance with the Declaration of Helsinki, national and institutional standards.
